items.title: Play this natural gas stock for a big breakout, says Carter Worth
items.description: The chart analyst breaks down the technical outlook for Williams Companies.

items.title: Dan Niles says investors have to 'forget about' valuations and names his favorite tech stocks
items.description: The money manager's comments come as the market rallies to record highs.

items.title: Stay away from these two big U.S. banks as valuations grow stretched, Baird says
items.description: The recent rally in Bank of America and JPMorgan may soon stall or reverse, the Wall Street broker says.

items.title: Buy this megacap tech stock that's set to rally more than 20% due to AI, says Citizens
items.description: The ramp-up in artificial intelligence may send shares higher in the coming months, according to Citizens.

items.title: HSBC upgrades Nike shares after earnings beat, says inflection is 'finally here'
items.description: Nike is poised to see even more gains following its better-than-expected results for the fiscal fourth quarter, HSBC said Friday.
